ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/15/99 8:56:57 PM Eastern Daylight Time, kim@stormhaven.org writes: Spoiler rhymes with.......hmm what the heck rhymes with spoiler.
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/15/99 8:56:57 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
kim@... writes:


Spoiler rhymes with.......hmm what the heck rhymes with spoiler.













<< I was actually trying to
learn if anyone had figured out the staff segment quest in
Highhold, and did a double take when I saw "lute" and "gypsy."
:-) >>


Is this where the quest starts ? or in neriak ? just where is that fixed
location? ( me and some higher lvl friends are going to try to get that mask
and i want to screw around ) i'm really loving how things seem to be
connected. get to a level and get the mask. go start the quest, progress a
little more and get the lute. etc etc. its neat how it works out,,hehe i'm
babbling.
